urlText: T1 Western Line: Trackwork may affect your travel
content:
Saturday 30 and Sunday 31 October
  • Penrith trains make an extra stop at Burwood.
  • Richmond trains run between Richmond and Olympic Park only. You may need to change at Parramatta to continue your journey.
  • From 11pm Saturday until 5am Sunday, trains run to a changed timetable between Penrith and Ashfield only, making extra stops at Flemington and Homebush. Buses replace all trains between Ashfield and Central.
  • If you are travelling to the City change at Lidcombe for trains via Bankstown, or change at Strathfield for express buses to Central.
  • On Sunday from 6.30am until 10.30am, Richmond trains run between Richmond and Strathfield only.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.
Bus routes
45T2: Ashfield, Summer Hill, then express to Newtown, Macdonaldtown, then Central and return
46T2: Ashfield, all stations to Central and return
50T2: Lewisham, Petersham, Stanmore, then express to Central and return
40T2: Strathfield, then express to Central and return
subtitle: T1 Western Line: Trackwork may affect your travel

properties.speechText:
Saturday 30 and Sunday 31 October

    Penrith trains make an extra stop at Burwood.
    Richmond trains run between Richmond and Olympic Park only. You may need to change at Parramatta to continue your journey.
    From 11 PM Saturday until 5 AM Sunday, trains run to a changed timetable between Penrith and Ashfield only, making extra stops at Flemington and Homebush. Buses replace all trains between Ashfield and Central.
    If you are travelling to the City change at Lidcombe for trains via Bankstown, or change at Strathfield for express buses to Central.

    On Sunday from 6 30 AM until 10 30 AM, Richmond trains run between Richmond and Strathfield only.
